data.lyric:
[ti:Self Control (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:The Continuance (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Self Control (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:00.33]Drum Dummie
[00:01.82]CashMoneyAP
[00:06.61]DJ Swift on the track
[00:13.48]I'ma leave here with what I came here for now what you sayin'
[00:16.54]You don't wan' take it there don't go there with us nah
[00:19.18]Walked in with a Styrofoam cup with plenty racks off in my hands
[00:22.65]And we ain't come here for to lose we want it all
[00:25.61]Smokin' dro 'cause I need it
[00:27.85]So I could be calm instead of dangerous when you see me
[00:30.83]You n***as know we quick to let it blow for any reason
[00:33.89]Kick down your door post up on your front porch and we ain't leavin'
[00:36.78]When my grandma died I had to beat the odds and it wasn't easy
[00:39.94]When Boozilla died I almost lost my mind broke me to pieces
[00:42.90]We was slangin' iron for Dump and all the rest it ain't no secret
[00:46.44]38 across my neck we be them boys you don't want beef with
[00:49.72]Smokin' dro smell it when I hit the door 'cause I need it
[00:52.49]I ain't the one these p***y n***as know I be fiendin'
[00:55.60]I bought the car with diamonds 'round my throat b***h I'm beamin'
[00:58.55]I don't think no n***a can't see me I be paranoid while I'm leanin'
[01:02.85]Smokin' dro 'cause I need it
[01:04.98]So I could be calm instead of dangerous when you see me
[01:07.99]You n***as know we quick to let it blow for any reason
[01:11.09]Kick down your door post up on your front porch and we ain't leavin'
[01:15.42]I'ma leave here with what I came here for now what you sayin'
[01:18.46]You don't wan' take it there don't go there with us nah
[01:21.14]Walked in with a Styrofoam cup with plenty racks off in my hands
[01:24.66]And we ain't come here for to lose we want it all
[01:27.09]Whole lot of racks on these VV's
[01:28.25]I'm so slime on this Glock got a green beam
[01:29.86]Got a whole lot of people that need me
[01:31.50]Bust your head all over the right thing
[01:33.36]I ain't got nothin' but a dub and a Black Card
[01:35.09]Up inside my Ami' jeans
[01:36.54]I just want head can't f**k in a bed
[01:37.82]It's just some things don't excite me
[01:39.71]Testin' your gun inside of the backyard let it hit get your aim up
[01:42.57]My youngin official he wait in your backyard and I call him the bang thug
[01:45.57]Wake up in the morning get fresh as a b***h
[01:47.09]I'ma walk in the 'yo in some Margielas
[01:48.62]And the way we gon' dump at the boy
[01:49.85]With the stick I'ma finish him off with a four nickel
[01:51.71]I be thinkin' 'bout Dump all over the time this s**t just don't feel right
[01:54.79]I don't go to no club I be takin' these drugs ridin'
[01:56.86]And keepin' that steel tight
[01:57.93]Every night 'fore I sleep I think 'bout the North Side
[01:59.78]Where I grew up no ho type
[02:01.01]Play I put you to sleep before you could see
[02:02.60]B***h
[02:02.73]Pull up where you be and it's on sight
[02:04.87]I'ma leave here with what I came here for now what you sayin'
[02:08.03]You don't wan' take it there don't go there with us nah
[02:10.70]Walked in with a Styrofoam cup with plenty racks off in my hands
[02:14.14]And we ain't come here for to lose we want it all
[02:17.11]Smokin' dro 'cause I need it
[02:19.38]So I could be calm instead of dangerous when you see me
[02:22.29]You n***as know we quick to let it blow for any reason
[02:25.40]Kick down your door post up on your front porch and we ain't leavin'
data.trans:
[ti:Self Control (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:The Continuance (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.33]Drum Dummie制作
[00:01.82]CashMoneyAP制作
[00:06.61]DJ Swift制作
[00:13.48]我会得到想要的一切 然后离开这里 现在你想说什么
[00:16.54]如果你不想拼命 那就不要跟我们一起走
[00:19.18]我来到这里 一手端着塑料杯 一手握着大把钞票
[00:22.65]我们来到这里就不会输 我们要赢得一切
[00:25.61]抽一点那种东西 因为那是我的必需品
[00:27.85]只有这样 我才能在和你相遇时 保持冷静 不做危险的事
[00:30.83]你们都知道 我们很容易就因为一点小事发火
[00:33.89]踢开你家门 守在你家门口 我们就是不走
[00:36.78]当我奶奶去世后 我必须克服艰难险阻 日子过得很困难
[00:39.94]当Boozilla去世时 我几乎崩溃了 我真的心如刀绞
[00:42.90]我们当时冷血无情 心狠手辣 这已不是秘密
[00:46.44]脖子上戴着子弹项链 我们是你们惹不起的人
[00:49.72]出门之后 我就抽那种东西 因为那是我的必需品
[00:52.49]我不是仁慈的人 这些孬种都知道我手段残忍
[00:55.60]我买了汽车 脖子上还戴着钻石 碧池 我飞黄腾达了
[00:58.55]我觉得没有谁不知道我 当我很嗨的时候 我就有点多疑
[01:02.85]抽一点那种东西 因为那是我的必需品
[01:04.98]只有这样 我才能在和你相遇时 保持冷静 不做危险的事
[01:07.99]你们都知道 我们很容易就因为一点小事发火
[01:11.09]踢开你家门 守在你家门口 我们就是不走
[01:15.42]我会得到想要的一切 然后离开这里 现在你想说什么
[01:18.46]如果你不想拼命 那就不要跟我们一起走
[01:21.14]我来到这里 一手端着塑料杯 一手握着大把钞票
[01:24.66]我们来到这里就不会输 我们要赢得一切
[01:27.09]花了好多钞票买高纯度的钻石
[01:28.25]我好酷 这把格洛克手枪还配了激光瞄准镜
[01:29.86]好多人都需要我
[01:31.50]轻而易举让你的脑袋开花
[01:33.36]我的Amiri牛仔裤里没什么东西
[01:35.09]只有一点零钱和一张代表尊贵身份的信用卡
[01:36.54]我只想换一种方式玩 不想那么传统
[01:37.82]主要是那种事情让我没什么兴趣
[01:39.71]在院子里测试一下你的枪 找准目标就发射
[01:42.57]我的兄弟很专业 他在你家后院等着 我给他一个电话 枪声就响起来了
[01:45.57]早上醒来 神清气爽
[01:47.09]我要穿着Margiela的衣服出去走一走
[01:48.62]我们要带着武器去教训下那个小子
[01:49.85]我要用点四五口径的子弹了结他
[01:51.71]我一直想着打打杀杀 这有点不太对劲
[01:54.79]我不去夜店 我自己一个人嗨
[01:56.86]始终把枪带在身上
[01:57.93]每天晚上睡觉前 我都会想起北区
[01:59.78]我在那里长大 与女人无关
[02:01.01]敢乱来 我就让你长眠不起
[02:02.60]//
[02:02.73]来到你所在的地方 那里将会变成案发现场
[02:04.87]我会得到想要的一切 然后离开这里 现在你想说什么
[02:08.03]如果你不想拼命 那就不要跟我们一起走
[02:10.70]我来到这里 一手端着塑料杯 一手握着大把钞票
[02:14.14]我们来到这里就不会输 我们要赢得一切
[02:17.11]抽一点那种东西 因为那是我的必需品
[02:19.38]只有这样 我才能在和你相遇时 保持冷静 不做危险的事
[02:22.29]你们都知道 我们很容易就因为一点小事发火
[02:25.40]踢开你家门 守在你家门口 我们就是不走
